
\beginhymn Gaudete, gaudete.

\begingroup

%\moveleft5mm\vbox{
%\hsize100mm

\resetlayout

\def\notes{\vnotes3}%quavers
\def\Notes{\vnotes4}%minims
\def\NOtes{\vnotes5}%dotted minims
\def\NOTes{\vnotes6}%semibreves

%\rmlyrics

\def\engl#1{\cchar{16}{\itlyrics #1}}
\def\lati#1{\cchar{22}{\rmlyrics #1}}

\def\vengl#1{\cchar{-13}{\itlyrics #1}}
\def\vlati#1{\cchar{-7}{\rmlyrics #1}}

\instrumentnumber2
%\setstaffs1{2}
\setclef1{\bass}
\smallmusicsize
\interstaff{16}
\sepbarrules
\group{12}
%\generalmeter{\meterfrac42}
%\group{12} % don't know why I had this twice
\startpiece
\notes\en
\Notes\lati{Gau-}\hd{a}\hu{a}|\hd{e}\hu{'a}\en
\Notes\lati{de-}\hd{a}\hu{c}|\hd{e}\hu{'a}\en
\Notes\engl{\idx{Rejoice, rejoice!}}\lati{te,}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\notes\lati{gau-}\qd{a}\qu{c}|\qd{e}\qu{'a}\en
\notes\lati{de-}\qd{`g}\qu{d}|\qd{g}\qu{'b}\en
\Notes\lati{te!}\hd{`c}\hu{e}|\hd{g}\hu{'c}\en
\bar
\notes\lati{}\qd{`c}\qu{e}|\qd{g}\qu{'c}\en
\Notes\lati{Christus est~}\hd{`g}\hu{d}|\hd{g}\hu{'b}\en
\notes\lati{}\engl{Christ is born,}\qd{a}\qu{c}|\qd{e}\qu{'a}\en
\Notes\lati{na-}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\Notes\lati{tus,}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\nextline
\Notes\lati{Ex}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\Notes\lati{Ma-}\hd{a}\hu{c}|\hd{e}\hu{'a}\en
\NOtes\lati{ri-}\engl{of the Virgin}\hdp{`g}\hup{d}|\hdp{g}\hup{'b}\en
\notes\lati{a}\qd{a}\qu{c}|\qd{e}\qu{'a}\en
\bar
\Notes\lati{Vir-}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\notes\lati{gi-}\qd{`f}\sh\qu{a}|\qd{d}\qu{'a}\en
\Notes\lati{ne,}\engl{Mary, ~ rejoice!}\hd{`g}\hu{`g}|\hd{g}\hu{'b}\en
\notes\lati{gau-}\qd{`f}\qu{a}|\qd{d}\qu{'a}\en
\Notes\lati{de-}\hd{`e}\hu{b}|\hd{e}\hu{g}\en
\NOTes\lati{te!}\hd{`a}\hu{a}|\hd{e}\hu{'a}\en%\wa gives semibreves
\endpiece

\setclef1{\treble}
\instrumentnumber1
\group{}
\startpiece
\notes\en
\notes\qa{'a}\en
\notes\vlati{~ 1.~Tempus ad ~ est}\qa{'a}\en
\notes\qa{g}\en
\notes\vengl{The time of grace has come}\qa{'a}\en
\notes\qa{'c}\en
\notes\vlati{gra-ti-\ae}\qa{'b}\en
\Notes\ha{'a}\en
\bar
\notes\qa{'a}\en
\notes\qa{f}\en
\notes\qa{e}\en
\notes\vlati{Hoc quod optabamus, ~}\vengl{For which we have prayed}\qa{f}\en
\Notes\ha{d}\en
\Notes\ha{d}\en
\nextline
\notes\vengl{}\qa{d}\en
\notes\vlati{Carmina}\qa{d}\en
\notes\qa{f}\en
\notes\vengl{Let us devoutly}\qa{d}\en
\notes\vlati{~ ~l\ae -ti-ti-\ae}\qa{f}\en
\notes\qa{g}\en
\Notes\ha{'a}\en
\bar
\notes\qa{'c}\en
\notes\vlati{Devote}\qa{'a}\en
\notes\qa{'b}\en
\notes\vengl{Sing songs of joy.}\qa{'c}\en
\Notes\vlati{reddamus.}\ha{'a}\en
\Notes\ha{'a}\en
\setdoublebar\endpiece

%}

\endgroup



\bigskip

%Pehaps get the tune for the verses

%\medskip

\hbox{
\vtop{
\hsize40mm

\beginlyrics

\rm%lyrics

%\verse1. Tempus ad est grati\ae \\
%Hoc quod optabamus,\\
%Carmina l\ae titi\ae \\
%Devote reddamus.

\verse2. Deus homo factus est,\\
Natura mirante,\\
Mundus renovatus est\\
A Christo regnante.

\verse3. Ezechielis porta\\
Clausa per transitur,\\
Unde lux est orta\\
Salus invenitur.

\verse4. Ergo nostra contio\\
Psallat jam in lustro,\\
Benedicat Domino,\\
Salus Regi nostro.

\endlyrics

}

\hskip5mm

\vtop{
\hsize60mm

\beginlyrics

\it%lyrics

%\verse1. The time of grace has come\\
%For which we have prayed\\
%Let us devoutly\\
%Sing songs of joy.

\verse2. God is made man,\\
While nature wonders\\
The world is renewed\\
By Christ the King.

\verse3. The closed gate of Ezekiel\\
Has been passed through;\\
Whence the light has risen,\\
Salvation is found.

\verse4. Therefore let our assembly\\
Sing praises at this time of purification\\
Let us bless the Lord:\\
Greetings to our King.

\endlyrics

}

}


\interstaff9
